1.) Yes everyone could access to your api if your controller doesn't have any authorization query.

2.) Out of the Box -> use [Authorize] Attribute or anything like if(user.permission == "Foo")

Check out for detail information:

  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/blazor/security/?view=aspnetcore-3.1
  • https://chrissainty.com/securing-your-blazor-apps-authentication-with-clientside-blazor-using-webapi-aspnet-core-identity/
